title: Fnatic could be the best team in the world in 2015
body:
I've been watching the LPL, LCS EU, and LCS NA.

I think team Fnatic just might be the best team in the league in 2015 with their 3-0 start.

Yellowstar is their shotcaller and team leader being drafted from Korea where he formerly played with Against All Authority, and SK Gaming.  Team Fnatic's shotcalling is making the difference this year.

Making Yellowstar's shotcall execute cleanly is the awesomely accurate Febivan who plays Mid for Fnatic and has a ridiculous KDA of 29 and has not died in the first three games of the LCS EU.  Febivan has made enormous plays on Xenthar and his Ultimate finishing snipes have been awesome LCS big plays all the way through.

I definitely think Fnatic is the team to beat in the LCS EU right now and is maybe one of the top five teams in the world and my early favorite to make it to the World Championship.

replies.body:
I've been watching both LCS' and a few games of LCK/LPL.

In EU, SK looks really scary since they have all the tools from last year, but arguably upgraded at ADC/Mid. Really looking forward to El Clasico.

We shouldn't hastily put them so high, there is still a lot of LoL to play. But Yellowstar has 100% upped his game. It feels like he hasn't missed a step since Rekkles left the team.

was there a new champ released??

I wanna play it
"Xenthar"

#NOTEVENCLOSEderpderp{{summoner:3}}

Xenthar the son of Xenalth
Praised be his name

EU is trash

CLG, TSM, C9, TL, WF, TiP > FnC, SK, EL, UL

>

> CLG, TSM, C9, TL, WF, TiP > FnC, SK, EL, UL

{{summoner:3}}
People need to stop doing this stupid "EU>NA or NA>EU", they are pretty equal in strength as a region and both get shit on by chinese and korean teams.

A little trash talk is fun as long as you don't take it too seriously. 

At the end of the day, who cares who wins? Why do we even watch sports, were it not for entertainment and rivalry?
So not all NA > EU. Just most. Got it.
I think Tigers and SKT would edge out all other teams but yea FNC and SK look pretty scary.. No teams has impressed me in NA.. Sorry.
I wanna see FNC vs SK before I agree on anything, both are really strong right now. I do believe those two are the top 2 in EU.

Yeah me too after seeing Forgiven playing the last few weeks it's definitely Fnatic and SK that is ruling the European scene.

Can Fnatic stop SK from taking all the dragons?
Can Fnatic even kill Forgiven just once?

Can anyone kill Forgiven the Immortal One?
They almost just loss to 0-3 GMB so I'd say... no.

I would say that it is extremely difficult to compare different leagues.

THough EU and NA are pretty close in playstyle.
But asian leagues are different sort.

But yea Fnatic apprears to be pretty strong
He's been to world's all 4 times on 3 different teams, people need to stop underestimating Yellow. As for FNC being the best in the world, I highly doubt it at the moment.
I think they could be at the top of EU potentially but right now i doubt they are gonna be THAT good.
